Haptics_Options_SubDesc: Enable or disable some parts of the mod.
Haptics_Options_EnableFeedback_Desc:
Enable Haptic Feedback to the device(s) connected via. Buttplug.
Disable this if you just want to host the mod for others.
Haptics_Options_Websocket_Desc:
The URI which your Buttplug Server is listening on.
You should be able to omit the 'ws://' at the beginning.
Haptics_IntensityOptions_SubDesc: Change the Intensity with which your vibrator vibrates.
